article_title: Charlotte’s top business leaders upbeat about 2016 economic outlook
article_text:
Optimism comes even as several of Charlotte’s companies are undergoing change and uncertainty

Bank executives say Fed interest rate hike a return to normal

article_metadata.news-keywords: charlotte chamber of commerce, economic outlook, tim belk, susan devore, lynn good, david carroll, jeffrey lacker, brian moynihan, charlotte-based, belk, duke energy, wells fargo, premier, federal reserve bank of richmond, bank of america
article_metadata.description: After a year filled with change and uncertainty at several Charlotte corporations, some of the city’s top leaders voiced optimism about the local business environment and economic outlook on Friday.
article_metadata.title: Charlotte’s top business leaders upbeat about 2016 economic outlook | The Charlotte Observer
